sensors.title: Sensors
sensors.description: Array of the sun positions to keep track of with sensors

lowerThreshold.title: Lower Threshold
lowerThreshold.description: Lower threshold within which the sensor should activate. In degrees. 0° - North, 90° - East, 180° - South, 270° - West. You can also use optionally values between -360° and 0° as well as 360° and 720° to define overlaps.

upperThreshold.title: Upper Threshold
upperThreshold.description: Upper threshold within which the sensor should activate. In degrees. 0° - North, 90° - East, 180° - South, 270° - West. You can also use optionally values between -360° and 0° as well as 360° and 720° to define overlaps.
